column1: Smoque BBQ////Two of us tried a half-half plate of brisket and pulled pork and one tried brisket and smoked sausage. Very tender with excellent smoke flavor - just the right amount! For me the BBQ sauces were ok
column2: but this is such a personal choice it's hard to find any fault with them. We tried three sides. Slaw
column3: which was good. The mac and cheese was average. Kind of soupy and thin. Nothing special. Fries were home cut. Good
column4: but again nothing that spectacular compared to other places that offer them. Now the bread pudding was excellent. So a big plus for that.
